text: Modern Romance is a 1981 romantic comedy directed by Albert Brooks (who also stars) and also starring James L. Brooks, Bruno Kirby, Kathryn Harrold, George Kennedy, Albert Henderson. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1981 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Albert Brooks Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies set in California Category:Movies about filmmaking
title: Modern Romance
